title: Hi! I'm Li Yuxuan
subtitle: 你好啊！我是李雨轩
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const o={a:"a",hr:"hr",p:"p",...i.components},{WavingAvatar:a}=o;return a||function(e,n){throw new Error("Expected "+(n?"component":"object")+" `"+e+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}("WavingAvatar",!0),t(e,{children:[n("div",{className:"flex w-full items-center justify-center",children:n(a,{})}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Hey there, lovely people of the internet! 🌟 I'm Li Yuxuan, but you can call me YX for short (Sorry my name is kind of hard to pronounce in English🙇🏻‍♂️). Picture this: a blend of Chinese roots with a sprinkle of Singaporean spirit – that's me! I've been on this sunny island since I was 15, and let me tell you, Singapore feels like a second home now."}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["By day, I'm diving deep into the world of software engineering, crafting digital wonders with a focus on web development. I'm currently working in ",n(o.a,{href:"https://mobbin.com",children:"Mobbin"})," as a Software Engineer, working on an internal tool that aims to bridge between designs and AI🤫. From coding to creating, I'm currently focusing all about making user experiences sing with beauty and functionality, and constantly learning about the ever-evolving massive world of software engineering out there. Think smooth interfaces and apps that just get you – that's the dream I'm chasing!"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"But wait, there's more! Teaching is my jam too. I've got this knack for turning learning into an adventure, whether it's through coding tutorials or sharing my love for music theory. I think I am pretty good at turning knowledge into effective learning adventures for students. One of my secret weapons is to always use real-world relatable examples (if it is something the student can personally relate to, it is even better!) when teaching a complicated concept so that my students can understand more easily."}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["Speaking of which, did I mention my musical escapades? Piano, violin, guitar – you name it, I've dabbled in it. And let's not forget my fascination with Ghibli films and their enchanting soundtracks. (Thank you so much Hayao Miyazaki and Joe Hisaishi 🙏🏻❤️). If you catch me lost in thought, I'm probably composing my own melodies or whipping up some magical graphics to go with them. And why stopping here if I can create music myself? So I tried out music composition with my MIDI keyboards and softwares, made ",n(o.a,{href:"https://youtube.com/@bbfishstudio8837",children:"quite a few pieces"})," over the years, and learnt not just music creation, but also audio and video graphic editings along the way as well!"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Now, let's switch gears a bit. While I'm not exactly a marathon enthusiast (running? Nah, not my scene), give me a pool, a bike, or a pair of rollerblades, and I'm in my element. There's something liberating about cruising through the city, soaking in the sights, and stumbling upon hidden gems along the way."}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Oh, and did I mention books? I'm a bit of a bookworm too. From thought-provoking reads to whimsical tales, my bookshelf (a digital one 👀) is always brimming with stories waiting to be discovered."}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["So, there you have it – a glimpse into my eclectic world of code, creativity, and curiosity. Feel free to wander through my digital playground here and ",n(o.a,{href:"/contacts",children:"drop me a line"})," if you fancy a chat. Let's make some magic happen together!"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Catch you on the flip side,
Yuxuan 😉"}),"
",n(o.hr,{}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"嘿朋友们！🌟 我是李雨轩。我在中国福建厦门长大，但从15岁起，我就在新加坡这个阳光明媚的岛屿上生活到现在，新加坡已经成为了我的第二家园。"}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["白天，我身处软件工程的世界，专注于网页开发。目前我在",n(o.a,{href:"https://mobbin.com",children:"Mobbin"}),"担任一名软件工程师，参与开发一个旨在连接人工智能与设计的内部工具🤫。从编码到创作，我把我的重心完全放在打造既美观又功能强大的用户体验上，同时不断探索着日新月异的软件工程世界。想象一下流畅的界面和让人心领神会的应用——这正是我追求的梦想！"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"此外，教学也是我的一大爱好。我擅长将学习变成一次冒险，无论是通过编程教程还是分享我对音乐理论的热爱。我觉得我在将知识转化为有效的学习内容方面做得还可以哈哈。我的一个小诀窍：就是始终使用与现实生活息息相关的例子（如果学生能够与之产生共鸣，那就更好！）来教授复杂的概念，以便让我的学生更容易理解。"}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["说到音乐，我的生活真的不能没有音乐。钢琴、小提琴、吉他，这些我都尝试过。还有，我是忠实的吉卜力电影粉，痴迷于宫崎骏爷爷和久石让爷爷极力打造的一个奇幻美好、单纯安静的世界（感谢宫崎骏和久石让🙏🏻❤️）。如果你看到我陷入沉思，那么我可能正在创作自己的旋律，或者正在脑补一些能够将音乐和我的本意表达出来的图像和动画吧。在过去这些年里，我也尝试了用我的 MIDI 键盘和软件进行音乐创作，多年来创作了",n(o.a,{href:"https://youtube.com/@bbfishstudio8837",children:"不少作品"}),"，并且在这个过程中不仅学会了音乐创作，还学会了音频和视频以及图像的编辑。"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"我不是马拉松爱好者（跑步绝对不是我的菜），我更喜欢游泳、骑车或者滑旱冰。在城市中自由驰骋，享受风景，发现隐藏宝藏，看看身边发生的各种小小的生活碎片，这种感觉让我心旷神怡。"}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"哦，对了，我时不时也看一些书籍，从发人深省的阅读到诙谐幽默的故事，我的书架（一本电纸书👀）充满了等待被发现的故事。"}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["所以，这就是我多元化的代码、创造力和好奇心世界的一瞥。这里是我搭建的一个数字游乐场，如果你感兴趣，可以停下繁忙的脚步，看一看瞧一瞧，如果有什么想要和我聊聊，也欢迎",n(o.a,{href:"/contacts",children:"给我留言"}),"。让我们一起制造一些有魔力的东西吧！"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"不见不散！
雨轩 😉"})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Hobbies
subtitle: 兴趣爱好
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const r={a:"a",h2:"h2",p:"p",strong:"strong",...t.components};return i(e,{children:[i(r.p,{children:["In my spare time, I immerse myself in a diverse array of hobbies that reflect my multifaceted interests and passions. I find solace in the imaginative realms crafted by ",n(r.strong,{children:"Studio Ghibli"}),", where each ",n(r.strong,{children:"film"})," offers a captivating escape into worlds brimming with dreams, love, and kindness. ",n(r.strong,{children:"Music"})," is not just a pastime but a deeply ingrained part of my life—I've honed my skills across various instruments, from piano and violin to guitar and beyond, allowing me to ",n(r.strong,{children:"compose"})," my own melodies and produce music that speaks to the heart. ",n(r.strong,{children:"Photography"})," serves as my visual storytelling medium, capturing fleeting moments and encapsulating the beauty found in the world around me. When it comes to staying active, you'll often find me zipping through city streets on ",n(r.strong,{children:"rollerblades"}),", relishing the freedom of movement and the thrill of discovering hidden treasures in every corner. These hobbies not only provide me with endless joy and inspiration but also shape my perspective and enrich my life in countless ways."]}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["在我的空闲时间里，我有多方面的兴趣爱好。我在由",n(r.strong,{children:"吉卜力"}),"工作室打造的想象领域中找到了慰藉，在每一部",n(r.strong,{children:"电影"}),"中，我都能沉浸在充满梦想、爱和善良的世界中。",n(r.strong,{children:"音乐"}),"不仅仅是一种消遣，而是我生活中深深扎根的一部分——我在钢琴、小提琴和吉他等各种乐器上磨练自己的技能，让我能够",n(r.strong,{children:"创作出自己的旋律"}),"，制作出触动心灵的音乐。",n(r.strong,{children:"摄影"}),"是我视觉叙事的媒介，捕捉着流逝的时刻，封存着我周围世界的美丽。当谈到保持活跃时，你经常会在城市街头看到我",n(r.strong,{children:"滑着旱冰鞋穿行"}),"，享受着自由的动感和发现每个角落隐藏宝藏的刺激。这些爱好不仅为我带来无尽的快乐和灵感，而且在无数方面塑造了我的观点，丰富了我的生活。"]}),"
",n(r.h2,{children:"Music composition 🎹"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"... List down some music pieces here and links"}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["Follow my ",n(r.a,{href:"https://instagram.com/bbfish_studio",children:"Instagram"})," to see my music!"]}),"
",n(r.h2,{children:"Roller skating 🛼"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"... A photo of my rollerblades?"}),"
",n(r.h2,{children:"Photography 📷"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"... Some photos taken can be shown here"}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["Follow my ",n(r.a,{href:"https://instagram.com/bbfish.photo",children:"Instagram"})," to see my photos!"]}),"
",n(r.h2,{children:"Reading 📚"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Here are some of my favorite books:"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"..."})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?n(i,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Projects
subtitle: 小成果展示
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:t,jsxs:a}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const o={a:"a",code:"code",figcaption:"figcaption",figure:"figure",h2:"h2",hr:"hr",img:"img",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",...r.components},{BadgeGroup:n}=o;return n||function(e,t){throw new Error("Expected "+(t?"component":"object")+" `"+e+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}("BadgeGroup",!0),a(e,{children:[t(o.h2,{children:t(o.a,{href:"https://taboo-ai.vercel.app",children:"Taboo AI"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:t(o.img,{src:"https://github.com/xmliszt/resources/blob/main/taboo-ai/images/v300/poster3.0(features).png?raw=true",alt:"Taboo AI"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"Taboo AI offers English learners a gamified experience to practice English expressions and vocabulary, with feedbacks. The game is based on the popular board game Taboo, where players have to describe a word without using a list of forbidden words."}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"Taboo AI 提供给英语学习者一种游戏化的体验，帮助他们练习英语表达和词汇，并提供反馈。这款游戏是基于流行的桌游Game of Taboo开发的，玩家需要描述一个词，但不能使用一系列禁止使用的词汇，达到让AI猜出这个词是什么的目的。"}),"
",t(n,{tags:["typescript","nextjs","tailwindcss","supabase","postgres"]}),"
",t(o.hr,{}),"
",t(o.h2,{children:t(o.a,{href:"https://www.npmjs.com/package/easy-next",children:"Easy Next"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:t(o.img,{src:"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/portfolio-35dfd.appspot.com/o/v2%2FtAD6hG0KxDMM1OiiRmfhRgXyY1d2%2Fprojects%2Feasy-next-poster.png?alt=media&token=acd43a73-7806-4aab-8929-18935cda0127",alt:"Easy Next"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"Easy Next is a CLI template tool to create a new Next.js App Router Typescript project with a single command. It's a wrapper around the Next.js CLI, with a few extra features, like choosing a template, adding additional libraries and frameworks, setting up linters and formatters, and more."}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"Easy Next 是一个 CLI 模板工具，可通过单个命令创建新的 Next.js 应用程序路由 TypeScript 项目。它是 Next.js CLI 的封装，具有一些额外的功能，如选择模板、添加额外的库和框架、设置代码检查工具和格式工具等。"}),"
",a(o.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:[t(o.figcaption,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-title":"","data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-dark-dimmed",children:"easy-next usage easy-next使用方法"}),t(o.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#22272e",color:"#adbac7"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-dark-dimmed",children:t(o.code,{"data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-dark-dimmed",style:{display:"grid"},children:a(o.span,{"data-line":"",children:[t(o.span,{style:{color:"#F69D50"},children:"npx"}),t(o.span,{style:{color:"#96D0FF"},children:" easy-next@latest"})]})})})]}),"
",t(n,{tags:["javascript","nodejs","npm"]}),"
",t(o.hr,{}),"
",t(o.h2,{children:t(o.a,{href:"https://costume-party.web.app/",children:"Costume Party"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:t(o.img,{src:"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/portfolio-35dfd.appspot.com/o/v2%2FtAD6hG0KxDMM1OiiRmfhRgXyY1d2%2Fprojects%2FArtboard%201.png?alt=media&token=75e3fece-c208-4ff2-824f-c088f1c285fe",alt:"Costume Party"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"Costume Party brings the fun of Costume Party Assassins board game to the web. It's a last-man-standing game where players have to guess other players' identities through their actions and movements across the rooms, and carry out assassinations to be the last one alive."}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"Costume Party 将《Costume Party Assassins》桌游的乐趣带到了网络中。这是一个生存至最后的游戏，玩家需要通过其他玩家在房间间的行动和移动来猜测其身份，并进行暗杀行动，以成为最后存活的人。"}),"
",t(n,{tags:["typescript","vuejs","firebase"]}),"
",t(o.hr,{}),"
",t(o.h2,{children:t(o.a,{href:"https://xmliszt.itch.io/mario-final",children:"Mario recreated"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:t(o.img,{src:"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/portfolio-35dfd.appspot.com/o/v2%2FtAD6hG0KxDMM1OiiRmfhRgXyY1d2%2Fprojects%2FMario%20Final.png?alt=media&token=d38ee634-050a-4831-a5fa-7f34d7596e50",alt:"Mario recreated"})}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"A unity project back in uni, where I recreated the levels of the original Mario game, with increased difficulties and new mechanics. For example, Mario have a inventory system to store up to 4 power-ups."}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"一个我在大学里做的Unity项目，我在其中重新制作了原始马里奥游戏的关卡，增加了难度和新的机制。例如，马里奥有一个道具系统，可以存储高达4个强化道具并依次使用。"}),"
",t(n,{tags:["c#","unity"]}),"
",t(o.hr,{})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:a}=e.components||{};return a?t(a,{...e,children:t(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
